filmography.title: You're in the Navy Now
filmography.role_description: A minor role as a crew member in this military comedy; Marvin's film debut.
filmography.plot: A green naval officer is assigned to command a ship with a steam engine that the crew can't figure out how to operate.

filmography.title: The Big Heat
filmography.role_description: A sadistic mobster infamous for throwing scalding coffee in his girlfriend's face; the role that put Marvin on the map.
filmography.plot: A tough cop takes on a corrupt political syndicate after they kill his wife in a car bomb meant for him.

filmography.title: The Wild One
filmography.role_description: The leader of a rival motorcycle gang who challenges Marlon Brando's character for dominance.
filmography.plot: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

filmography.title: Gun Fury
filmography.role_description: A henchman in a gang of outlaws, showcasing his early career typecasting as a Western heavy.
filmography.plot: After a stagecoach robbery, a man pursues the gang that kidnapped his fiancée.

filmography.title: The Caine Mutiny
filmography.role_description: A sloppy, grumbling sailor who becomes the target of Captain Queeg's obsession with shirt-tails.
filmography.plot: When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability, the First Officer relieves him of command and faces court martial.

filmography.title: Bad Day at Black Rock
filmography.role_description: A menacing cowboy henchman who tries to intimidate a one-armed stranger visiting a town with a dark secret.
filmography.plot: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town and uncovers a terrible secret that the citizens will kill to keep.

filmography.title: Pete Kelly's Blues
filmography.role_description: A refined but ruthless jazz clarinetist who leads a Dixieland band in Prohibition-era Kansas City.
filmography.plot: A jazz trumpeter in 1927 Kansas City finds his band threatened by a local racketeer who wants a cut of their earnings.

filmography.title: Seven Men from Now
filmography.role_description: A charming but dangerous outlaw who aids a former sheriff in hunting down seven men, aiming to steal the gold they carried.
filmography.plot: A former sheriff blames himself for his wife's death during a Wells Fargo robbery and vows to kill the seven men responsible.

filmography.title: Attack
filmography.role_description: A cynical, political officer who knowingly keeps an incompetent captain in command during the Battle of the Bulge.
filmography.plot: A coward captain is the only authority in a unit that is about to undertake a dangerous mission.
filmography.awards: Venice Film Festival: Italian Critics Award

filmography.title: Raintree County
filmography.role_description: A boisterous, competitive local champion who engages in a footrace with Montgomery Clift's character.
filmography.plot: An idealist teacher marries a beautiful but disturbed Southern belle during the American Civil War.

filmography.title: The Comancheros
filmography.role_description: A half-scalped, volatile gunrunner for a criminal society, who has a tense showdown with John Wayne.
filmography.plot: A Texas Ranger and a gambler team up to stop a gang of arms merchants and Comanches.

filmography.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
filmography.role_description: The sadistic, whip-wielding outlaw who terrorizes the town of Shinbone; one of the screen's most terrifying western villains.
filmography.plot: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

filmography.title: Donovan's Reef
filmography.role_description: A brawling Navy veteran who shares a tropical island paradise with his old commander, John Wayne.
filmography.plot: Three WWII veterans live on a French Polynesian island, but their paradise is disrupted when the daughter of one arrives.

filmography.title: The Killers
filmography.role_description: A professional hitman who becomes obsessed with finding out why his latest victim didn't try to run.
filmography.plot: Two hitmen confront their victim who refuses to flee, leading them to investigate who ordered the hit and why.

filmography.title: Cat Ballou
filmography.role_description: A dual role playing both a drunken, washed-up gunfighter and his deadly, silver-nosed assassin brother.
filmography.plot: A woman seeking revenge for her murdered father hires a famous gunman, but he's very different from what she expects.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actor; BAFTA: Win – Best Foreign Actor; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: Ship of Fools
filmography.role_description: A washed-up American baseball player traveling to Germany, struggling with his fading career and prejudices.
filmography.plot: A diverse group of passengers on a ship from Mexico to Germany in 1933 grapple with their personal demons and the rising tide of fascism.

filmography.title: The Professionals
filmography.role_description: A weapons expert and tactician who leads a team of mercenaries on a rescue mission in Mexico.
filmography.plot: An American oil tycoon hires four professionals to rescue his kidnapped wife from a Mexican bandit.

filmography.title: The Dirty Dozen
filmography.role_description: A rebellious U.S. Army Major tasked with training twelve convicted murderers for a suicide mission behind enemy lines.
filmography.plot: A rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

filmography.title: Point Blank
filmography.role_description: A relentless criminal who is betrayed by his wife and partner, returning from the dead to demand the money he is owed.
filmography.plot: After being double-crossed and left for dead, a mysterious man named Walker single-mindedly tries to retrieve the money that was stolen from him.

filmography.title: Hell in the Pacific
filmography.role_description: An American pilot stranded on a deserted island who engages in a psychological war with a stranded Japanese officer.
filmography.plot: During World War II, an American pilot and a Japanese naval officer are stranded on a small uninhabited island in the Pacific and must find a way to survive.

filmography.title: Paint Your Wagon
filmography.role_description: A grizzled prospector in a boomtown who famously sings 'Wand'rin' Star' in a raspy baritone.
filmography.plot: Two unlikely prospector partners share the same wife in a California gold rush mining town.

filmography.title: Monte Walsh
filmography.role_description: An aging cowboy who struggles to find his place as the Old West disappears and corporations take over.
filmography.plot: An aging cowboy realizes that the West he knew and loved is dying, and he has no place in the new world.

filmography.title: Prime Cut
filmography.role_description: A Chicago mob enforcer sent to Kansas to collect a debt from a slaughterhouse owner who is trafficking women.
filmography.plot: A Chicago mob enforcer is sent to Kansas City to settle a debt with a cattle rancher who not only grinds his enemies into sausage but sells women as sex slaves.

filmography.title: Emperor of the North
filmography.role_description: A legendary hobo during the Great Depression who accepts a challenge to ride the train of a sadistic conductor.
filmography.plot: A hobo king challenges the conductor who has sworn that no one will ever ride his train for free.

filmography.title: The Iceman Cometh
filmography.role_description: A traveling salesman who visits a saloon of drunks to convince them to give up their 'pipe dreams'.
filmography.plot: A traveling salesman visits a run-down saloon and tries to convince the patrons to give up their pipe dreams.

filmography.title: The Big Red One
filmography.role_description: A veteran WWI soldier who leads a squad of young recruits through the major battles of the European theater in WWII.
filmography.plot: A veteran sergeant of World War I leads a squad in World War II, always surviving while only one of his men survives with him.

filmography.title: Gorky Park
filmography.role_description: A wealthy American sable smuggler in Moscow who becomes the prime suspect in a triple murder investigation.
filmography.plot: A Moscow police officer investigates a bizarre triple murder and stumbles upon a high-level political conspiracy.

filmography.title: The Delta Force
filmography.role_description: The commander of an elite counter-terrorism unit tasked with rescuing hostages from a hijacked plane; Marvin's final film role.
filmography.plot: A 707 aircraft jetliner is hijacked by terrorists, and The Delta Force is sent in to resolve the crisis.
